resources.string: Here at 2Get, we are helping to create an easy experience for keeping track of the most common items that you might need throughout your week. \n\nWhether you are going to the store to just pick up some milk, or need to make a list of your entire food shopping before you leave the house, 2Get is here to help you prepare.

Here at 2Get, we want to be completely transparent with you about the use of some permissions in our app. The only permission that we use is that of accessing your photo's. This is for the strict purpose of being able to save your Shopping List in order to be able to view it, as well as send it to those that you need to send it to. 

We want you to understand what we are asking for when you press accept to allow us to access your mobile device.

Thank you for letting us be a part of your Shopping Experience.
